mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.specialreq_code AS "specialreqCode", a.specialreq_name AS "specialreqName", a.ext_field1 AS "extField1", a.ext_field2 AS "extField2", a.ext_field3 AS "extField3", a.remark AS "remark"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM doc_specialreq a
AND a.specialreq_code LIKE '%'||#{specialreqCode}||'%' '%'+#{specialreqCode}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{specialreqCode}, '%')
AND a.specialreq_name LIKE '%'||#{specialreqName}||'%' '%'+#{specialreqName}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{specialreqName}, '%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO doc_specialreq( specialreq_code, specialreq_name, ext_field1, ext_field2, ext_field3, remark ) VALUES ( #{specialreqCode}, #{specialreqName}, #{extField1}, #{extField2}, #{extField3}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: UPDATE doc_specialreq SET specialreq_code = #{specialreqCode}, specialreq_name = #{specialreqName}, ext_field1 = #{extField1}, ext_field2 = #{extField2}, ext_field3 = #{extField3}, remark = #{remark} WHERE id = #{id}
